title: Unspecified Error cannot play league..
body: It's been about a week and not only me have been having this problem. And the same exact solution has been proposed to everyone with this problem AND IT STILL HAS NOT WORKED. All I wanna do is play league. I get unspecified error at random percentages I did the all of the guides to fix this that riot has to offer. Which was just a complete waste of time. Please help me and everyone having this problem fix this. This is clearly not our computer it has to been something riot  did.

replies.body:
Since you didn't specify what guides you've already tried, I can't be sure what you've already addressed. *Unspecified Errors* typically occur after 32% during the patching process, therefore the issue is typically tied to an *unstable connection* to our patching servers. I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address the most common causes for this issue.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
